Nested Class Summary
static class CalendarUtils.Unit
          Unit is utilized to distinguish the valid types of units that can be utilized by a series of difference methods within this class.

add

public static void add(java.util.Calendar c,
                       int unit,

Add a long amount to a calendar. Similar to calendar.add() but accepts a long argument instead of limiting it to an int.

Parameters:
c - the calendar
unit - the unit to increment
increment - the amount to increment

tieredDifference

public static java.util.Map<CalendarUtils.Unit,java.lang.Long> tieredDifference(java.util.Calendar c1,
                                                                                java.util.Calendar c2)
Find the number of units passed between two Calendar objects in all units. This would return a result like 1 year, 2 months and 3 days. This method assumes you want the difference broken down in all available units.S

Parameters:
c1 - The first occurring Calendar
c2 - The later occurring Calendar
Returns:
the number of units passed without overlap

tieredDifference

public static java.util.Map<CalendarUtils.Unit,java.lang.Long> tieredDifference(java.util.Calendar c1,
                                                                                java.util.Calendar c2,
                                                                                java.util.List<CalendarUtils.Unit> units)
Find the number of units passed between two Calendar objects in all units. This would return a result like 1 year, 2 months and 3 days.

Parameters:
c1 - The first occurring Calendar
c2 - The later occurring Calendar
units - The list of units to calculate the difference in
Returns:
the number of units passed without overlap
